title.rendered: MELPe STANAG-4591 for Mobile Devices Application optimized for ARM

content.rendered:
MELPe STANAG-4591 vocoder is available for Mobile Devices, and is optimized for ARM processors. Compandent offers also a very helpful sample application. More information is available at

MELPe Mobile Application
